QuestData.Title: Leyline Feed: Ley Station Aethenar
QuestData.Description: <This leyline appears to be damaged and needs repair.$b$bSeveral large chunks of the main column are missing and arcane energy is crackling in the gaps.$b$bThe elementals nearby seem to pick up debris and absorb it into their bodies as they move around. Maybe they have the missing pieces...>
QuestData.AreaDescription: Collect 6 Leyline Feed Fragments and infuse the feed with ancient mana.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 6 Leyline Feed Fragments and infuse the feed with ancient mana.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The leyline feed crackles as wild energy escapes the gaps in the column.>
QuestData.RewardText: <As you insert the fragments back into the pillar the arcane energy begins repairing the cracks. You infuse the feed with ancient mana and the structure stirs to life.>
